description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger, from two first texts. Physical description: 15 lines per page. Written in medium large naskh in black ink with use of red for some words and text-stops. Thick dark cream paper, glossy, with chain and laid lines visible. The text is vocalized. Titles written in red with vocalization in black, except titles on fol. 54a and 57a, in gold (outlined in black), with red for vocalization and filling. Table of contents on the pastedown of the lower cover. Leaves missing between fol. 6 and 7, 53 and 54. Worm-eaten. Inscription on a label pasted on the upper cover: "395" (in Arabic numerals, and in Western numerals). Repeated on the margin of fol. 1a, in the form: "numrah 395".
abstract: Acephalous and defective collection of twenty-eight texts of the Druze community, comprising texts 71-74, 77-78, 82-85, 89-90, 97-108, 119-122 in Sylvestre de Sacy's description in Exposé de la religion des Druzes (1838), followed by a short text by another hand on fol. 83b-84b.
contents: 1. fol. 1a-10b: [al-Mawsūmah bi-Miʻrāj najāt al-muwaḥḥidīn wa-sullam ḥayāt al-mūqinīn - incomplete] (Sacy, no. 71).
2. fol. 11a-20a: al-Risālah fī dhikr al-maʻād wa-al-radd ʻalá man ʻabbara ʻanhu bi-al-ghalaṭ wa-al-ilḥād (Sacy, no. 72).
3. fol. 20a-23b: Dhikr al-Radd ʻalá ahl al-taʼwīl (Sacy, no. 77).
4. fol. 23b-32a: Tawbīkh Ibn al-Barbarīyah al-Risālah al-dāmighah lil-fāsiq al-najis al-fāḍiḥah li-atbāʻihi ahl al-raddah wa-al-balas (Sacy, no. 78).
5. fol. 32a-36a: Tawbīkh Sahl (Sacy, no. 82).
6. fol. 36a-37b: Tawbīkh Ḥasan Ibn Maʻallā (Sacy, no. 83).
7. fol. 38a-41b: Tawbīkh al-Khāʼib Maḥallā (Sacy, no. 84).
8. fol. 42a-43a: Risālat al-Banāt al-kabīrah (Sacy, no. 85).
9. fol. 43a-44a: al-Mawsūmah bi-al-Mūʻiẓah (Sacy, no. 89).
10. fol. 44a-45b: al-Muwājahah (Sacy, no. 90).
11. fol. 45b-46b: al-Sijill al-wārid ilá Naṣr (Sacy, no. 97).
12. fol. 46b-47b: Manshūr al-Shaykh Abū al-Maʻālī al-Ṭāhir (Sacy, no. 98).
13. fol. 47b-48b: Manshūr ilá Jamāʻat Abī Turāb wa-shuyūkh al-mawāḍiʻ min al-ahl wa-al-aṣḥāb (Sacy, no. 99).
14. fol. 49a-50a: Risālat Jabal al-Summāq (Sacy, no. 100).
15. fol. 50a-51b: Manshūr ilá Āl ʻAbd Allāh wa-Āl Sulaymān (Sacy, no. 101).
16. fol. 51b-53a: Manshūr Aban ʻAlī (Sacy, no. 102).
17. fol. 53b: Manshūr rumiza li-Abī al-Khayr Salāmah [incomplete at end] (Sacy, no. 103).
18. fol. 54a-57a: al-Mawsūmah bi-Risālat al-Tabyīn wa-al-istidrāk li-baʻḍ mā lam tudrikuhu al-ʻuqūl fī kashf al-kufr wa-al-maḥjūb min al-ilḥād wa-al-ishrāk (Sacy, no. 73).
19. fol. 57a-59b: al-Risālah al-mawsūmah bi-al-Isrāʼilīyah al-dāmighah li-ahl al-ladad wa-al-juḥūd aʻnī al-kafarah min ahl al-sharīʻah (Sacy, no. 74).
20. fol. 59b-62b: Manshūr al-sharṭ wa-al-baṭṭ (Sacy, no. 104).
21. fol. 62b-64b: Mukātabah ilá al-Shuyūkh al-awwābīn (Sacy, no. 105).
22. fol. 64b-67a: Manshūr fī dhikr aqālat Saʻd (Sacy, no. 106).
23. fol. 67a-68b: Mukātabah rumiza ilá al-Shaykh Abū al-Maʻālī (Sacy, no. 107).
24. fol. 68b-72b: Manshūr ilá al-maḥall al-azhar al-sharīf (Sacy, no. 108).
25. fol. 73a-75b: Manshūr Naṣr ibn Futūḥ (Sacy, no. 119).
26. fol. 75b-78a: Mukātabah rumiza ilá āl Abī Turāb (Sacy, no. 120).
27. fol. 78a-81a: al-Risālah al-wāṣilah ilá al-Jabal al-anwar (Sacy, no. 121).
28. fol. 81a-83a: Mukātabat al-Shaykh Abū al-Maʻālī (Sacy, no. 122).
29. fol. 83b-84b: [Short text by a later hand, incomplete, starting with: "Qawluhu inna [---] al-ḥakīm al-muqām al-mawjūd"]
extent: 84 leaves: paper ; 205 x 150 (140 x 110) mm. bound to 215 x 170 mm.

title.@value: Miʻrāj najāt al-muwaḥḥidīn wa-sullam ḥayāt al-mūqinīn. al-Risālah fī dhikr al-maʻād wa-al-radd ʻalá man ʻabbara ʻanhu bi-al-ghalaṭ wa-al-ilḥād ... [etc.].

provenance: Acquired by Robert Garrett from the books of Murād Bey al-Bārūdī (Beirut), 1925.
dlme_provenance_en: Acquired by Robert Garrett from the books of Murād Bey al-Bārūdī (Beirut), 1925.
subject: Druzes—Sacred books
binding_note: Paper over paper pasteboards for upper and lower covers. Spine wanting. Paper pastedowns.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
